summary: After being bitten by a bat in a cave, a doctor undergoes an accelerating transformation into a man-bat, which ruins his vacation and causes considerable distress for his wife.
cast: Stewart Moss|Marianne McAndrew|Michael Pataki|Paul Carr|Arthur Space|Robert Berk|Pat Delany|George Paulsin|Bonnie Van Dyke|Jennifer Kulik|Laurie Brooks Jefferson|Herb Pierce
keywords: man bat|body horror|man beast|grindhouse film|psychotronic film
title: The Bat People
